description:
While out shopping, Hibiki and Breakin pursue a falling light they assume is a Dance Stone, but turns out to be... Santa Claus! They bring the super-macho Santa to their school Christmas party, but it`s interrupted by Mink and Tank trying to steal their Christmas tree.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Santa Claus Is in a Hurry?!
サンタクロースは慌てんぼう?
